languages.text: "Со слов отца — достойной женщиной со слабым здоровьем. Она не перенесла родов. Наверное, тот факт, что я не знал ее — единственное сожаление в моей жизни".
"From what my father told me, she was a principled woman of poor health. She died in childbirth. Not having known her might be the sole regret of my life."
languages.original_text: "Со слов отца — достойной женщиной со слабым здоровьем. Она не перенесла родов. Наверное, тот факт, что я не знал ее — единственное сожаление в моей жизни".

traits.locale_text: "From what my father told me, she was a principled woman of poor health. She died in childbirth. Not having known her might be the sole regret of my life."
"From what my father told me, she was a principled woman of poor health. She died in childbirth. Not having known her might be the sole regret of my life."

"From what my father told me, she was a principled woman of poor health. She died in childbirth. Not having known her might be the sole regret of my life."
"From what my father told me, she was a principled woman of poor health. She died in childbirth. Not having known her might be the sole regret of my life."

languages.text: 「父の話によれば、母は信念のある人だったが、体が弱かったそうです。母は出産で亡くなりました。母を知らずに生きてきたことが、私の人生で唯一の後悔かもしれません」
languages.original_text: "From what my father told me, she was a principled woman of poor health. She died in childbirth. Not having known her might be the sole regret of my life."

traits.locale_text: 「父の話によれば、母は信念のある人だったが、体が弱かったそうです。母は出産で亡くなりました。母を知らずに生きてきたことが、私の人生で唯一の後悔かもしれません」

languages.text: "Laut meinem Vater war sie eine Frau mit Prinzipien und angegriffener Gesundheit. Sie starb bei meiner Geburt. Sie nicht gekannt zu haben, ist vielleicht das Einzige in meinem Leben, was ich wirklich bereue."
languages.original_text: "From what my father told me, she was a principled woman of poor health. She died in childbirth. Not having known her might be the sole regret of my life."

traits.locale_text: "Laut meinem Vater war sie eine Frau mit Prinzipien und angegriffener Gesundheit. Sie starb bei meiner Geburt. Sie nicht gekannt zu haben, ist vielleicht das Einzige in meinem Leben, was ich wirklich bereue."

languages.text: « De ce que m'a raconté mon père, c'était une femme honorable, mais à la santé fragile. Elle est morte en couches. Mon unique regret est de ne jamais l'avoir connue. »
languages.original_text: "From what my father told me, she was a principled woman of poor health. She died in childbirth. Not having known her might be the sole regret of my life."

traits.locale_text: « De ce que m'a raconté mon père, c'était une femme honorable, mais à la santé fragile. Elle est morte en couches. Mon unique regret est de ne jamais l'avoir connue. »

languages.text: «Según me contó mi padre, era una mujer de fuertes convicciones pero con una salud deplorable. Murió dándome a luz. No haber tenido ocasión de conocerla podría ser el mayor pesar que tengo en la vida».
languages.original_text: "From what my father told me, she was a principled woman of poor health. She died in childbirth. Not having known her might be the sole regret of my life."

traits.locale_text: «Según me contó mi padre, era una mujer de fuertes convicciones pero con una salud deplorable. Murió dándome a luz. No haber tenido ocasión de conocerla podría ser el mayor pesar que tengo en la vida».

languages.text: “根据我父亲的描述，她是个很有原则的女人，但身体很差，生我的时候难产而死。我从来没见过母亲，这可能是我人生中唯一的遗憾。”
languages.original_text: "From what my father told me, she was a principled woman of poor health. She died in childbirth. Not having known her might be the sole regret of my life."

traits.locale_text: “根据我父亲的描述，她是个很有原则的女人，但身体很差，生我的时候难产而死。我从来没见过母亲，这可能是我人生中唯一的遗憾。”

languages.text: "Babamın bana anlattığına göre prensip sahibi ama sağlığı zayıf bir kadınmış. Doğum sırasında ölmüş. Onu tanımamış olmak, muhtemelen hayatımın tek pişmanlığı."
languages.original_text: "From what my father told me, she was a principled woman of poor health. She died in childbirth. Not having known her might be the sole regret of my life."

traits.locale_text: "Babamın bana anlattığına göre prensip sahibi ama sağlığı zayıf bir kadınmış. Doğum sırasında ölmüş. Onu tanımamış olmak hayatımın muhtemelen tek pişmanlığı."

languages.original_text: "From what my father told me, she was a principled woman of poor health. She died in childbirth. Not having known her might be the sole regret of my life."
